Homepage.title: ProcessFlow
Homepage.titleDescription: The engine for gamified business processes
Homepage.createTeamDescription: Enter a name for your new team and select a color scheme.
Homepage.joinedTeamsDescription: Teams you have joined but did not create.

toasts.inviteAcceptedDescription: You are now a member of "{name}".
toasts.inviteAcceptedErrorDescription: An error occurred while accepting the invitation.
toasts.inviteDeclinedErrorDescription: An error occurred while declining the invitation.
toasts.teamCreatedErrorDescription: An error occurred while creating the team.

toasts.profileUpdatedDescription: Your profile information has been successfully updated.
toasts.profileUpdatedErrorDescription: An error occurred while updating your profile information.
toasts.profileUpdatedPictureTooLargeDescription: The picture you are trying to upload is too large. Please choose a picture smaller than 1 MB.

appearanceSettings.title: Appearance Settings
appearanceSettings.description: Customize the application to suit your needs.

toasts.appearanceUpdatedDescription: Your appearance settings have been successfully updated.
toasts.appearanceUpdatedErrorDescription: Your appearance settings could not be updated.

teamSettings.title: Settings
teamSettings.couldNotLoadTeam: Team settings could not be loaded.

ownerDangerZone.title: Danger Zone
ownerDangerZone.deleteTeamDescription: Permanently delete your team and all related data.

memberDangerZone.title: Danger Zone
memberDangerZone.leaveTeamDescription: Leave "${teamName}" and permanently delete all your related data.

invite.title: Invite Member
invite.description: Invite members to this team via email address.

toasts.invitationSentDescription: The invitation to {email} was successfully sent.
toasts.invitationSentErrorDescription: The invitation to {email} could not be sent.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Manage the roles in your team.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Role
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone and will remove the role from all members.

toasts.roleAddedErrorDescription: The role {name} could not be added.
toasts.roleAddedErrorNullDescription: The role could not be added because the name or color is empty.
toasts.roleDeletedErrorDescription: The role could not be deleted.

members.title: Members
members.description: Manage the members and their roles in this team.

confirmRemoveMember.title: Remove Member
confirmRemoveMember.description: Are you sure you want to remove this member? This action cannot be undone.

toasts.memberRemovedErrorDescription: The member could not be removed.
toasts.rolesUpdatedErrorDescription: The roles could not be updated.

tasks.couldNotFoundSelectedTask: The selected task could not be found.
tasks.selectTask: Select a task from the list.

toasts.taskCompletedDescription: The task was successfully completed and removed from your list.

editor.createProcessDescription: Create a new process model for your team.
editor.name: Process Name

save.saveErrorDescription: The process could not be saved.

instance.createNewInstanceDescription: Create a new instance of the process.
instance.instanceAPIExplanation: You can also send a POST request to this URL to create a new instance:

toasts.instanceCreatedErrorDescription: The instance could not be created.

delete.deleteProcessDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this process? This action cannot be undone. All data associated with this process will also be deleted.

toasts.processCreatedErrorDescription: The process could not be created.
